name: JellyCar 2
overview: The hit driving game is now available on the WiiWare service. JellyCar 2, the hit driving platform game, is here and fully loaded with more than 30 levels, multiplayer, and much more! Play head-to-head or co-op in Multiplayer Flag, Gems, and Tether modes. Post high scores, best times, and longest jumps in the Hall of Fame. With so much squishy goodness, you’ll want to drive JellyCar 2 all around town! Classic: Drive your squishy car and use your special abilities to drive through squishy worlds! Jelly Factory: Where does all this squishy goodness come from? The Jelly Factory, of course! In this puzzle game your goal is to guide the falling parts into matching chutes. Tap the levers to open different pathways to guide each part down the conveyor belts. Long Jump: You’re going for distance, so go for speed! Watch out for objects that can slow you down, and look for objects that can help give you a boost! Factory Mode: Create and play your own puzzles! Choose ramps, wheels, levers, and more!
